attributes.action: Ban the inhumane practice of halal slaughter in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: on the subject of farmed animal slaughter, defra state 'it is an absolute offence to cause or permit an animal avoidable excitement, pain or suffering. There are also specific rules on handling, stunning, slaughter or killing of animals.'

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to ban the inhumane practice of halal slaughter in the UK.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=halalslaughter


Her Majesty's Government
